components/header:
{{> components/navigation-toggle}} {{> components/search-form}} {{> components/navigation}}
{{> components/currency-selector}} {{> components/customer-links}} {{> components/cart/cart-preview-link}}
{{> components/branding location="header"}}
components/search-form:
{{{snippet 'forms_search'}}}
<form class="search-form" action="{{urls.search}}">
  <label class="search-label">
    <svg class="icon-search">
      <use xlink:href="#icon-search"></use>
    </svg>
    <input class="search-input" name="search_query" placeholder="{{lang 'header.search'}}" type="text">
  </label>
</form>

  • {{> components/navigation-item show_all=../theme_settings.categories-all-link}}
    • {{/each}} {{else if theme_settings.category_display '===' 'show_categories_dropdown'}}
  • {{lang 'common.shop_all'}}
      {{#each categories}}
    • {{> components/navigation-category-item show_all=../theme_settings.categories-all-link}}
      • {{/each}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.category_display '===' 'show_categories_meganav'}}
  • {{lang 'common.shop_all'}}
